{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16710v1", "title": "On the Asymptotic MSE-Optimality of Parametric Bayesian Channel
  Estimation in mmWave Systems", "summary": "The mean square error (MSE)-optimal estimator is known to be the conditional
mean estimator (CME). This paper introduces a parametric channel estimation
technique based on Bayesian estimation. This technique uses the estimated
channel parameters to parameterize the well-known LMMSE channel estimator. We
first derive an asymptotic CME formulation that holds for a wide range of
priors on the channel parameters. Based on this, we show that parametric
Bayesian channel estimation is MSE-optimal for high signal-to-noise ratio (SNR)
and/or long coherence intervals, i.e., many noisy observations provided within
one coherence interval. Numerical simulations validate the derived
formulations.", "main_category": "eess.SP", "categories": "eess.SP", "published": "2025-04-23T13:41:02Z"}
